p: Analyses were performed on a gas chromatograph (GC) Agilent HP-6890 with an HP-5MS capillary column (30 m × 0.25 mm × 0.25 μm), with the following working temperatures: injector 250°C, column 180 °C (5 min), 15 °C/min, 270 °C (15 min), 5 °C/min, 300 °C (10 min) and detector 300 °C. The chromatograph was coupled to an Agilent mass detector, HP-5975, operating at 70 eV, m/ z = 30 to 500 u.m.a.
